branchCategory.name: LEFB, Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Belt Drive, Motorless
branchCategory.description: The LEFB is available in a motorless type, permitting the mounting of an AC servo motor other than the standard chosen by SMC.  Shaft coupling and mounting patterns are compatible with 8 servo motor series from 5 manufacturers.  Manufacturers include Mitsubishi, Yaskawa, Sanyo Denki, Omron, and Panasonic.

breadCrumb.name: LEFB, Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Belt Drive, Motorless

relatedProductsItem.name: LECA6 Servo Motor Controller for LEF Series
